title: Catalogued Resource schema
description: Metadata schema for a Catalogued Resource

accessRights.description: A rights statement that concerns how the distribution is accessed.

created.description: The date when the catalogued resource was first added to catalogue.

creator.description: The organisation responsible for creating the catalogued resource.

description.description: A concise narrative of the content of an catalogued resource.

identifier.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to a catalogued resource within the catalogue.

issued.description: The date the catalogued resource was first made available.

license.description: A legal document under which the resource is made available.

title.description: Name or title used to label license

licenseURL.description: The location of the license document

keyword.description: Uncontrolled terms (words or phrases) assigned to describe an information resource.

modified.description: The date on which the data was created or last updated.

publisher.description: The entity responsible for making the catalogued resource publicly available.

securityClassification.description: An information security designation that identifies the minimum level of protection assigned to an information resource.

status.description: Lifecycle status of resource within catalogue

supplierIdentifier.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to a catalogued resource a third party (supplier's) system.

theme.description: Topic: A controlled term that expresses the broad topical content of an information resource. Subject: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.

title.description: The full and formal name given to an information resource. A name given to the distribution.

type.description: Topic: A controlled term that expresses the broad topical content of an information resource. Subject: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.
